education.area: B.S in Bussiness, Minor in Mathematics (In major GPA 3.5)

work.name: University of Washington
highlights: Guided students in mastering core programming concepts across courses including Functional Programming, Data Structures, Object-Oriented Programming, and Programming Fundamentals.
Offered one-on-one support in problem-solving and debugging, enhancing student comprehension of course material.
Evaluated 250+ assignments using automated testing scripts and detailed manual reviews.
Developed strong communication skills and analytical abilities by explaining complex programming concepts to students of varying skill levels.

work.name: Digital Horizon Studios
work.summary: Collaborated with design and innovation teams to develop multi-user interactive installation "Urban Connect" for Seattle Design Festival 2023.
highlights: Implemented real-time graphics features including custom meshes, shader programming using Unity's C# framework and URP.

Key features included: dynamic multi-point lighting system with variable intensity using distance fields, physics-based animations, procedural cloth simulation with multi-layered noise patterns, particle system collisions, and post-processing effects.
Extended depth camera SDK for on-site calibration and environmental mapping.
Received positive feedback from 150+ visitors who particularly appreciated the intuitive motion controls and collaborative gameplay elements.

work.name: Digital Horizon Studios
work.summary: Developed a motion-tracking interactive installation called "Character Connect" for the company's portfolio expansion into interactive digital experiences. The project was well-received internally and demonstrated potential for new client offerings.
highlights: Collaborated with senior developers to implement motion detection using computer vision libraries for real-time body tracking from camera input to control virtual character interactions.
Created custom shaders for environmental elements, water effects, character styling, and GPU-accelerated facial animation system using blend shapes and parametric expressions.
Created 3D assets, textures, and animations for characters and environment using professional modeling pipeline.

volunteer.summary: Taught programming fundamentals to underserved youth
highlights: Led weekend coding workshops for 30+ middle school students

awards.title: ACM Programming Competition - Regional Finalist
awards.summary: Placed in top 5 teams in the Pacific Northwest regional college programming competition.

publications.name: Developer Blog
publications.summary: Regular articles on graphics programming, web development, and software architecture.
